duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care and ongoing education in an ambulatory setting under physician or RN supervision.
Assist in data collection concerning the physical, psychological, social, and cultural dimensions of patients.
Implement age-appropriate interventions based on individual patient's needs as directed by RN/provider.
Provide ongoing education and reinforcement of care plans developed by the Provider/RN.
Ensure safe environment and safe delivery of care.
Document and capture charges for clinical support services rendered within the patient visit.
Assist with administrative tasks and communicate with team members, referring providers, and patients.
Maintain supplies and equipment and provide administrative support to licensed healthcare professionals.
Demonstrate teamwork in the delivery of patient care.

education_certification.credential: Graduated from an accredited Licensed Practical Nurse Program
Licensed to practice as a Practical Nurse (LPN) in the Commonwealth of Virginia prior to onboarding.
BLS: Basic Life Support-American Heart Association (AHA)
